channel.title: Disk-Encryption-Sets on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Disk-Encryption-Sets on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Encryption at host & disk encryption sets support in node auto-provisioning
item.description:
AKS node auto-provisioning now supports Encryption at Host and disk encryption sets, enabling use in clusters with stricter encryption requirements.

  • Source: Azure Updates
